The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 September is 323,029 (573.9 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 11 September, there were 18,403 new confirmed cases (32.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 September, there were 13,019 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 41% (5384 extra cases).
